channel.title: What am i not doing right
channel.description:
OK! What else do i do??? ive done everything to get a server up and online! !!!!!! √ = YES X = NO !!!!!!!
THE NORMAL WAY:
Portforwarded [√] Allowed 43594 thru Windows Firewall [√] Got an No-Ip [√] Allowed 43594 thru my second router [√] Have Java [√] Evironment Variables set right [√] Server online [X] People Connecting [X] canyouseeme.org sees 43594 open [X]
THE "IF NOTHING ELSE WORKS" WAY:
Downloaded uTorrent [√] Ran the source before setting 43594 in uTorrent [√] Server online [X] People Connecting [X] canyouseeme.org sees 43594 open [X]
Ry60003333's Automatic Portforwarding way:
Put the autoportforwarding file into the server files [√] Put the code in the Run.bat and Compile.bat files [√] Put the code into server.java [√] Compiled Perfectly [√] Server online [X] People Connecting [X] canyouseeme.org sees 43594 open [X]
Ive followed all the steps, ive done every single thing all the guides say. and yet people still cannot connect to my server. WHAT AM I DOING WRONG? PLEASE TELL ME

item.title: What am i not doing right
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Ah, I see, my bad. So have you checked canyouseeme.org yet? Is your JDK declared correctly? What does your server say when you run the Run.bat? Post your batch file code. Disable your anti-virus and firewall.

If it works after you disable your anti-virus/firewall you know it is to do with that, and can make sure you are making exceptions to the correct ports.

Read full topic
item.source: What am i not doing right

item.title: What am i not doing right

item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Mendorphins:

You have an X on every “Server online”. Putting it online is a start.

thats my problem, i cant get it online… “server online” just meens like “is the server online?”

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gemm wrote:

I can help you, send me a pm of TEAMVIEWER, i’ll get you running in no time.

UPDATED MESSAGE ->
1)Either you portforwarded wrong, didn’t edit your server on Firewall etc.
2)I know i might have 10REP, and be a new Member,but i perfectly know how to host a server.
3)Which in fact, it will be my honor to help

^Added the numbers to make the message look smart

Gemm
